page.title: 06A Day in the Life of........
page.content: Pamela Moss. On Thursday mornings, I get up at about 7.45 a.m. After breakfast I have a wash and clean my teeth,I wait for my mum to take me to school.First thing I do is go to recorder class.After assembly we go to our classroom and do some English writing until playtime and Maths till dinner time.At dinner time we go down to the dining room,then we go out to play again.I go to brass lesson later on.When we come in from the yard, we read for 10 minutes or so.Then we do art and paint before afternoon play.Then we go and sit at the front and listen to a story.We put our chairs up and say prayers.I do my homework and have my tea and get ready for Brownies.At Brownies we play games,make things and draw things.We give 20p in a tub for subs.After Brownies I go home and then go to bed.
